info.title: Podcast API
info.description: Swagger documentation for the Podcast App

get.description: Get a filtered list of categories
Retrieve detailed information about a specific category by ID.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: ID of the category to retrieve

put.description: Update the information of an existing category by ID.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: ID of the category to update

delete.description: Permanently delete a category by ID.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: ID of the category to delete

500.description: Server error - Unable to delete category

get.description: Get a filtered and sorted list of episodes

schema.description: Comma-separated list of fields to sort by. Prefix with "-" for descending order.

post.description: Create a new episode with audio file upload

get.description: Get a filtered list of podcasts

description.example: "Kane and Abel" can refer to two distinct narratives: a biblical story and a novel by Jeffrey Archer.

get.description: Get a filtered list of publishers

parameters.description: ID of the publisher to retrieve

put.description: Update the information of an existing publisher by ID.

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: ID of the publisher to update

delete.description: Permanently delete a publisher by ID.

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: ID of the publisher to delete

500.description: Server error - Unable to delete publisher

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of tags.
